name: eu-cohesion-beneficiaries-uk
notes:
### About

Information on Beneficiaries of European Union Cohesion Policy in the UK. See also:

 * <http://ckan.net/tag/read/eu-cohesion>

### Access

Main URL:

  * <http://ec.europa.eu/regional_policy/country/commu/beneficiaries/uk/index_en.htm>

Regions:

  * Northern Ireland <http://www.dfpni.gov.uk/index/finance/european-funding/content_european-funding-beneficiaries-list.htm>
    * PDF: <http://www.dfpni.gov.uk/list_of_northern_ireland_beneficiaries_of_eu_funding_2007-3.pdf>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet: <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data#outgoing-20563>
  * East of England <http://www.eeda.org.uk/919.asp>
    * PDF: <http://www.eeda.org.uk/files/E_of_E_ERDF_Beneficiaries_List_v_2.pdf>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet: <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data_2#outgoing-20565>
  * East Midlands <http://www.eastmidlandserdf.org.uk/index.php?option=com_docman&task=cat_view&gid=101&Itemid=57>
    * PDF: <http://www.eastmidlandserdf.org.uk/index.php?option=com_docman&task=doc_download&gid=256&Itemid=69>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet: <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data_3#outgoing-20566>
  * Scotland <http://www.esep.co.uk/152.html>
    * PDF: <http://www.esep.co.uk/assets/files/ESF_Shadow.pdf>
    * PDF: <http://www.esep.co.uk/assets/files/R2%20awards%20esf.pdf>
    * PDF: <http://www.esep.co.uk/assets/files/R2%20awards%20erdf.pdf>
    * PDF: <http://www.esep.co.uk/assets/files/LUPS_ERDF2.pdf>
    * PDF: <http://www.esep.co.uk/assets/files/LUPS_ESF2.pdf>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet: <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data_4#outgoing-20569>
  * East & West Wales <http://www.wefo.wales.gov.uk/default.asp?action=page&ID=2537>
    * PDF: <http://www.wefo.wales.gov.uk/resource/beneficiaries5246.pdf>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet: <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data_5#outgoing-20571>
  * North East 
    * PDF <http://www.onenortheast.co.uk/lib/liDownload/14025/ERDF%202007-13%20list%20of%20beneficiaries.doc?CFID=2862302&CFTOKEN=34263608>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet: <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data_6#outgoing-20572>
  * West Midlands <http://www.advantagewm.co.uk/working-with-us/ERDF-Programme/default.aspx>
    * PDF: <http://www.advantagewm.co.uk/site-tools/download.aspx?id=tcm:9-16686&file=/Images/Beneficiaries%20under%20the%202007-2013%20ERDF%20Programme%20May%202009_tcm9-16686.pdf&title=List%20of%20ERDF%20Beneficiaries>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet: <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data_7#outgoing-20573>
  * South East <http://www.seeda.co.uk/European_Initiatives/European%20_Regional_Developments_Fund/South_East_ERDF_Competitiveness_Programme>
    * HTML: <http://www.seeda.co.uk/european_initiatives/european_regional_development_fund/south_east_erdf_competitiveness_programme/Round_One_Projects/>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet: <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data_8#outgoing-20574>
  * South West <http://www.southwestrda.org.uk/what-we-do/policy/european-prog/competitiveness.shtm>
    * PDF: <http://download.southwestrda.org.uk/file.asp?File=/policy-and-partnership/policy-and-partnership/Comp%20project%20list%20for%20web%20-%20Jan%2009.pdf>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet: <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data_9#outgoing-20575>
  * Cornwall & Isles <http://www.convergencecornwall.com/what-is-convergence/index.php#four>
    * <http://www.convergencecornwall.com/what-is-convergence/operational-programmes.php>
    * HTML: <http://www.convergencecornwall.com/what-is-convergence/operational-programmes.php>
    * HTML: <http://www.convergencecornwall.com/convergence-investments/>
    * HTML: <http://www.convergencecornwall.com/convergence-investments/search-results.php?funder=ERDF>
    * HTML: <http://www.convergencecornwall.com/convergence-investments/search-results.php?funder=ESF>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet (covered by request to South West RDA): <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data_9#outgoing-20575>
  * Yorkshire & Humber <http://www.yorkshire-forward.com/about/our-funding/erdf/programme-progress/funded-projects>
    * PDF: <http://www.yorkshire-forward.com/sites/default/files/documents/ERDF%20funded%20projects-%20Beneficiary%20list.pdf>
    * FOI request for spreadsheet: <http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/eu_cohesion_funding_data_10#outgoing-20577>
title: EU Cohesion Beneficiaries - UK
